body:
You are right. 

0.5 is a very crude epsilon. We could reduce it to a very small number. The point of adding it in the first place was to avoid 1/255 + 3/255 = 3.9999/255 ==> 3/255. But it will never be perfect. I'm happy to reduce it, or if you have a fundamentally better approach, I'd be excited about that too.
